bibl.title: Aelius Gallus’ Campaign and the Arab Trade in the Augustan Age
bibl.note: The campaign of Aelius Gallus, Prefect of Egypt (25-24 B.C.) was a total failure showing that the Roman Oriental trade should not be based on military conquest.

bibl.title: Lewis: Fourth century documents from Karanis

bibl.seg: SIMON Róbert, Aelius Gallus' Campaign and the Arab Trade in the Augustan Age. Avec résumé en anglais.
The campaign of Aelius Gallus, Prefect of Egypt (25-24 B.C.) was a total failure showing that the Roman Oriental trade should not be based on military conquest.
